recipesJson.name: Binary
recipesJson.author: LonesomeRhodesTN
recipesJson.description: Had to take a break from testing/mixing FA Tobaccos . . . so, I made this.  A banana/coconut pudding RY4.  The bones of this are the beautiful duo of coconuts in [hashslingingslashur's Leche de Coco](https://alltheflavors.com/recipes/42350#leche_de_coco_coconut_milk_by_hashslingingslashur) with 2 fantastic bananas (TFA Banana Nut Bread and Solub Arome's Banana Flambe), FA Bavarian Cream, and the underrated JF Cookie v2 making up the pudding.  2 RYs (JF RY4 Double and WF Vanilla Ruyan) along with FLV Smoked Butterscotch making up the RY4.  Enjoy!
